desc: Independent responsible jewellery brand. Catch Rhys designs and sells solid 9ct gold and sterling silver jewellery that's honestly priced, fairly marketed, and ethically sourced. They believe jewellery shouldn't cost the earth, so 85% of their jewellery is made from recycled metals, and is made in the UK & Italy.

layout.text: SOLID JEWELLERY THAT DOESN'T COST THE EARTH.
OUR JEWELLERY CAN BE RECYCLED OVER AND OVER AGAIN...
